trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The hanuman langur is beckoning to you with uncertain intent.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the strange hanuman langur and follow behind it.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_TODO_01<tab>Aid the Auri woman.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Auri woman.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_HANUMAN04268_000_000<tab><chitter> <chitter> Heee!
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_HANUMAN04268_000_001<tab><chitter> <chitter> Heeeheee!
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>It appears this creature wants you to follow it. What harm could come from doing so?
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_HANUMAN04268_000_010<tab><chitter> <chitter> Heeehooo!
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The creature appears to want you to follow it deeper into the jungle.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Follow the hanuman langur and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_HANUMAN04268_000_021<tab><chitter> <chitter> Hee! Heeehaaa!
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The creature has guided you to this elderly Auri woman, but you have yet to discern why. However, it is plain that she requires aid.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>You come upon an elderly Auri woman, bent over in pain and breathing haggardly. Provide what treatment to her that you can.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_030<tab>Thank...thank you. I feel much better now.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_031<tab>A terrible beast fell upon me, and I fled, quickly losing my bearings in the thick woods. This kindly creature guided me to safety, but my wounds pained me.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_032<tab>How long ago was that? Bells ago? Days ago? I cannot say...
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_HANUMAN04268_000_033<tab><chitter> <chitter> Heee!
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_034<tab>Of course, little friend. Thank you for delivering this kind soul to me. I owe you my life.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_HANUMAN04268_000_035<tab><chitter> <chitter> Heee! Heeeheee!

TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_035<tab>We shouldn't stay here, for nowhere outside the village gates is safe. I believe I can return safely on my own. Seek me out, and I shall see you are rewarded for what you've done.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_040<tab>Ah, my savior arrives at last! I feel right as rain now, and all thanks to your ministrations.
TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_041<tab>And that creature, of course. I haven't seen it since returning here...

TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_042<tab>The legends of this island say the hanuman langurs are servants of the divinities, appearing when they deign to show an interest in worldly affairs. I think there may be some truth to those tales.

TEXT_AKTKZF013_04268_WOMAN_000_043<tab>I must remember to make an offering when I am able. As for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> reward, however, please take this, and know that I shall never forget the goodwill you showed me.
